title: An Easy Victory (Part 2)
body:
An Easy Victory (Part 2)

Five undead sand golems were the first ones to enter the canyon.

ROAR-!!

After entering the canyon all of them roared out loud attracting the attention of all the thornblooms from the vicinity.

Auoo-!

When thornblooms saw five black sand golems they also shrieked out loud and charged towards them.

There were tens of thornbloom monsters coming towards them but the golems moved forward without any hesitation.

Rumble -!!

When the thornblooms were just fifty meters away from the golems, the ground of the canyon suddenly started to shake and the next second tens of sand worms and sand serpents came out from the ground appearing directly between the group of charging thornblooms.

Caught off guard, the thornblooms in front were not able to react, and around ten thornblooms were instantly killed by sand serpents and worms. 

Auooo-!
